DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , Phase II , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , dose-ranging study evaluate safety efficacy GDC-0853 combination standard care therapy participant moderate severe active systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) .
